name: Music_4035.wav
keywords: ['jam', 'gear', 'rhythm machine', 'electronic drum beat', 'bass guitar', 'acoustic guitar', 'male voice', 'advertising']
caption: This is an advertisement video for a rhythm machine. Firstly, it is shown playing behind a bass guitar jam. Then, it is shown playing behind an acoustic guitar jam. A male voice is describing the benefits and functions of the rhythm machine. The parts where the instruments can be heard without the interruption of the voice can be sampled for use in beat-making.
